r.s: PHP extension for interfacing with Apache ZooKeeper
r.d: This extension provides API for communicating with ZooKeeper service.
r.n: Bugs: - Correct exception message (From "Failed to connect to Zookeeper" to "Failed to initialize ZooKeeper ...", Issue #29) - Fix 'duplicate symbol _php_zk_config_ce' - Fix segmentation fault when destroying Zookeeper instance (GH PR #31)
